entry.title: Game: Mega Man X1 (SNES, 1993) (6)
entry.content:
I got past Vile, but had a heck of a time getting up the wall with the flying platformers... it was so painful. I feel like I'm really letting my kids down when they watch me and expect awesomeness.

Total time: 5:23

entry.title: Game: Mega Man X1 (SNES, 1993) (5)
entry.content:
I spent a lot of time trying to get the Hadouken today. I eventually got it, but I find it almost impossible to use because you need to be at full health. I got to the Spider in Sigma's fortress, but couldn't get past it.

Total time: 4:52

entry.title: Game: Mega Man X1 (SNES, 1993) (4)
entry.content:
I played again quite a lot today. I think all that is left is Armored Armadillo and two heart tanks (before moving on to Sigma's fortress.) This game is soooo good.

Total time: 3:34

entry.title: Game: Super Mario All-Stars (SNES, 1993) (4)
entry.content:
Today we played SMB1 and did levels 1-1 and 1-2. My son played himself. He spend 5 lives running directly into the first Goomba and cracking up. He thought it was sooo funny.

Total time: 0:09

entry.title: Game: Super Mario All-Stars (SNES, 1993) (3)
entry.content:
I played SMB1 in this for a while because my son wanted to see some Mario. When I died and needed to continue in the World 2 castle, my son suggested that we move on to a different game. He really enjoyed the water level in world 2.

Total time: 0:09
